pre_caption_prompt: Does the caption "The camera swiftly zooms in, smoothly rolling counterclockwise by 90 degrees without any shaking" correctly describe the camera motion in this video? Answer "Yes" or "No". And tell me why.
pre_caption:
Yes.

The video shows a rapid zoom-in effect, and the image appears to rotate counterclockwise by approximately 90 degrees. There's no noticeable shaking or jittering during the movement.
